Greetings.
Railway. Shunter, Signalman, Supervisor at Bounds Green Inter City Depot 1981 to 1994.
Fleet Ops Planner at Hornsey EMU / Train Servicing Centre 1994-2003.
2nd February 1992 Snapped Anterior Cruciate Ligament.in Val d'Isere - Carbon Fibre Replacement in Aix Le Baines.
2nd February 2002 Snapped the ACL Replacement in Val d'Isere again. 27th February 2003 ACL Hamstring Replacement Chelsea & Westminster.
Made redundant PTSD, Bi-Polar 2003.
Knee Replacement July 2018.
